verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> ye Jehovah <WH3050>. Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH376> that feareth <WH3372> Jehovah <WH3050>, That delighteth <WH2654> greatly <WH3966> in his commandments <WH4687>.
His seed <WH2233> shall be mighty <WH1368> upon earth <WH776>: The generation <WH1755> of the upright <WH3477> shall be blessed <WH1288>.
Wealth <WH1952> and riches <WH6239> are in his house <WH1004>; And his righteousness <WH6666> endureth <WH5975> for ever <WH5703>.
Unto the upright <WH3477> there ariseth <WH2224> light <WH216> in the darkness <WH2822>: He is gracious <WH2587>, and merciful <WH7349>, and righteous <WH6662>.
Well <WH2896> is it with the man <WH376> that dealeth graciously <WH2603> and lendeth <WH3867>; He shall maintain <WH3557> his cause <WH1697> in judgment <WH4941>.
For he shall never <WH5769> be moved <WH4131>; The righteous <WH6662> shall be had in everlasting <WH5769> remembrance <WH2143>.
He shall not be afraid <WH3372> of evil <WH7451> tidings <WH8052>: His heart <WH3820> is fixed <WH3559>, trusting <WH982> in Jehovah <WH3068>.
His heart <WH3820> is established <WH5564>, he shall not be afraid <WH3372>, Until he see <WH7200> his desire upon his adversaries <WH6862>.

He hath dispersed <WH6340>, he hath given <WH5414> to the needy <WH34>; His righteousness <WH6666> endureth <WH5975> for ever <WH5703>: His horn <WH7161> shall be exalted <WH7311> with honor <WH3519>.

The wicked <WH7563> shall see <WH7200> it <WH3707>, and be grieved; He shall gnash <WH2786> with his teeth <WH8127>, and melt away <WH4549>: The desire <WH8378> of the wicked <WH7563> shall perish <WH6>.
